# gran-range



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description           | Type     | Default     |
| -------- | --------- | --------------------- | -------- | ----------- |
| `max`    | `max`     | Valor maximo do range | `number` | `undefined` |
| `min`    | `min`     | Valor minimo do range | `number` | `undefined` |
| `value`  | `value`   | Valor atual do range  | `number` | `undefined` |


## Events

| Event     | Description                                  | Type               |
| --------- | -------------------------------------------- | ------------------ |
| `press`   | Disparado quando o usuario movimenta o range | `CustomEvent<any>` |
| `pressed` | Disparado quando o usuario solta o range     | `CustomEvent<any>` |
